original_text: Pharaoh’s army had marched out of Egypt, and when the Babylonians who were besieging Jerusalem heard the report about them, they withdrew from Jerusalem.
korean_text: 바로의 군대가 애굽에서 나오매 예루살렘을 에워쌌던 갈대아인이 그 소문을 듣고 예루살렘에서 떠났더라

sentences.original_text: Pharaoh's army had marched out of Egypt
when the Babylonians who were besieging Jerusalem
